isis.stitle: Recall 04503 Reminder Notice - BUNK CONTROL PANEL of certain 9100, 9200, 9300, 9400, and 9900 models built 4/1/1994 thru 6/16/2002

recall.subject: BUNK CONTROL PANEL of certain 9100, 9200, 9300, 9400, and 9900 models built 4/1/1994 thru 6/16/2002

para.exhotlnk: Print ready (PDF file) copy of the dealer letter

defect.para: THIS IS AN ISIS ONLY NOTIFICATION.
There will be NO Dealer Mailing for this RECALL REMINDER.
Please refer to the dealer letter G-04503 for service instructions.

Water intrusion into the sleeper berth's bunk control panel area may pool in the tops of the dome light, TV/VCR, and/or refrigerator power switches. The LED circuit boards (switch illumination) in these switches may begin to heat up and possibly produce a flame or fire without warning that could cause property damage, personal injury or death.

ownernote.para: This letter is to inform you that the owners of suspect vehicles who have not completed the Recall Service Procedure have been sent a reminder to schedule an appointment to have the service performed.
We appreciate your patience and cooperation regarding this campaign and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
